content.p: Loans, grants, bursaries or scholarships - your student funding depends on the course you are taking, your residency status, where you live in term time and your household income. View the table below and click the button relevant to you, to find out which funding you may be eligible for. Undergraduate student with 'home' fee status* including: Nursing, midwifery, physiotherapy, dietetics students Students on part-time courses Undergraduate funding information * A 'home' student is one who meets certain UK residence criteria. These are the same criteria as apply to eligibility for home funding from Student Finance.
